allow: Bash({ echo "=== USED VARIABLES ===" grep -ohE 'var\\\(--[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+' public/assets/front/css/muaadh-system.css public/assets/front/css/new/tokens.css public/assets/front/css/new/components.css public/assets/front/css/new/base.css public/assets/front/css/components/_user_dashboard.css)
Bash(sort -u echo "=== DEFINED VARIABLES ===" grep -ohE '^\\s*--[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+:' public/assets/front/css/theme-colors.css public/assets/front/css/new/tokens.css)
